summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, dated August 9, 2019. It details staff post assignments, shift changes, and leave statuses (sick, annual, AWOL) for correctional officers and other personnel. The document is significant as it provides a snapshot of prison staffing on a date shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest and during his incarceration.

events.title: MCC New York Daily Staff Roster
events.description: Standard daily assignment and shift change log for correctional staff at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: MCC NEW YORK NEW YORK, NY
keyFacts: The document is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated Friday, August 9, 2019.
It details shift assignments, post rotations (e.g., SHU, LOBBY, CONTROL), and leave statuses (Sick Leave, Annual Leave, AWOL) for correctional officers and other staff.
The roster includes entries for officers being relieved or having status changes, with timestamps and initials of personnel making the changes (e.g., RW, JD, KS, CP).
The document provides operational context for the prison's staffing on a date when Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate, though he is not mentioned by name in this excerpt.
The footer notes a total of 108 Correctional Services Staff and 18 Non-Correctional Services Staff for that day.
